#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int s=0,l,i,j,ctr,r,n1;
int n;
while(cin>>n)
{


    n1=n;
    i=0;ctr=0;
    while(n1!=0)
    {
        r=n1%10;
        if(r==0)
        ctr++;

        if(r!=0)
       {
        if(n%r==0)
        ctr++;
       }

    n1=n1/10;
    i++;
    }

if(i==ctr)
cout<<"Valid\n";
else
cout<<"Invalid\n";
}
return 0;
}
